{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=SBG7580 |revision=-AC |asin=B01KW9T39C |series=AC1750 |fcc_date=03/13/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=DareGlobal |manuf_model=ARTE00403 |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=UIDDG2470 |ic_id=6670A-DG2470 |pcb_id=ARCT04034 |pwr_v=115-240 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=C7P |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Intel Puma |cpu1_model=DHCE2652;Puma 6, DHCE2652, (SR1HM); |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646B-HCK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9381;AR9381-AL1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124S |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85309-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz SPDT Switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85605-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier;Skyworks;SKY85405-11;;3; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, bill of materials, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|SURFboard Cable Modem & Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/wi-fi-cable-modems/sbg7580-ac/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Arris|p=a0ha000000TnGugAAF}} "ARTE00403 REV A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :DOCSIS 3.0 32x8 channels{{CableModemSpec |down_c=32 |up_c=8 }} A picture of the label on [https://www.ebay.com/itm/ARRIS-SURFboard-SBG7580-AC-DOCSIS-3-0-Cable-Modem-WiFi-AC-1750-Router/192498186696?epid=937797814&hash=item2cd1c939c8:g:d7UAAOSwz2Val8aW ebay] shows that this device reuses the FCC ID :from the [[Arris DG2470A]], [[Arris DG2460A]], and [[Arris DG1680A]]. Chip IDs are not legible in FCC internal photos so they are taken from :the bill of materials document. CPU is an [[Intel Puma]] 6 - DHCE2652 (SR1HM) Media Gateway (MG) :This product likely benefits from the [https://qdms.intel.com/dm/i.aspx/12331831-3717-4811-838E-052B632C7172/PCN113653-00.pdf ''B-Step to D-Step Conversion''] :which "Adds support for DOCSIS 3.0 32x8" Devices in the FCC listing only support DOCSIS 3.0 24x8. ===See also=== *[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] __NOTOC__
